overview.title: Overview
overview.desc: In Kingshot, as the kingdom/server ages, new features and heroes are gradually unlocked. The timeline below shows approximate milestones.

vip.title: 1) Estimate via VIP Login Days
vip.desc: Check the total login days in the VIP tab. If the server was created and you logged in daily, this value is a fairly accurate estimate of the server age.
vip.caption: VIP Login Days Example

star.title: 2) Estimate via Achievement 'Star’s Flame'
star.desc: Go to the milestone statue in the city center or open it from the event page. Look for the second achievement, 'Star’s Flame'. It is usually completed on the 6th day after server creation. Subtracting 6 days from the completion date gives an approximate server creation date.
star.caption: Star’s Flame Achievement Example

buildings.title: Building Max Levels
buildings.p1: Most buildings can be upgraded up to Level 30, while some have a maximum of Level 10.
buildings.p2: Around server age Day 70, the Truegold (Golden) Age begins. The Town Center, Command Center, Barracks, Field Hospital, Embassy and others expand beyond Level 30 into Truegold (TG) stages.
buildings.p3: Truegold upgrades progress as 30 → 30-1 → 30-2 → 30-3 → 30-4 → TG1 (a total of 15 steps from 30 to TG1). In the future, Truegold will unlock up to TG10.
buildings.p4: Kitchen, Houses, Infirmary, Walls, Defense Towers, and Guard Station are capped at Level 10.

lord.title: Governor Gear & Charms
lord.p1: Accessible from the profile (top-left corner of the screen).
lord.p2: Governor Gear Max Stage: Mythic T3 ★★★
lord.p3: Governor Charms Max Level: 11 (may be increased in the future)

beasts.title: Beasts & Monsters
beasts.p1: As the kingdom/server progresses, higher-level beasts and monsters appear.
beasts.p2: Beast Max Level: 30 / Monster Max Level: 7

heroes.title: Heroes & Hero Gear
heroes.li1: Hero Max Level: 80 (requires Town Center Lv.26)
heroes.li3: Hero Exclusive Gear Max Level: 10 — enhanced using exclusive parts
heroes.li4: Mastery Forging Max Level: 20 — Mythic Hero Gear requires Hammers and Legendary Gear for 20 additional levels

widgets.title: Hero Exclusive Gear
widgets.metaDesc: SSR Hero exclusive gear. Unlocks at Town Center Level 15 and can be enhanced up to 10 levels using exclusive materials.

what.title: What is Hero Exclusive Gear?
what.p1: Hero Exclusive Gear is special equipment available only to SSR Heroes.
what.p2: It unlocks at Town Center Level 15 and can be enhanced using exclusive materials.

upgrade.title: Enhancement
upgrade.li1: Can be enhanced up to 10 levels.
upgrade.li2: Higher levels increase useful abilities in Conquest and Expedition.

sources.title: Sources
sources.s1: Champagne Festival: Opens at the end of each season.
sources.s2: Hall of Heroes: Unlocks with server progression.
sources.s4: Mystery Shop: Available at a discount with Badges.

overview.title: Overview
overview.p2: Requirement: Before using Mastery Forging, the target Legendary Gear must be enhanced to Level 20 via normal enhancement.

target.title: Target
target.p1: Exclusive to Legendary Gear. Not applicable to Epic/Rare/Common Gear.
target.p2: Normal Enhancement consumes EXP/fusion, while Mastery Forging requires Hammers.

notice.title: Notes
notice.n1: From Mastery Level 11–20, additional complete Legendary Gear is required as material (Lv.11 → 1 pc … Lv.20 → 10 pcs).
notice.n2: When consuming Legendary Gear as material, all enhancement EXP is returned, and half of the Hammers used are refunded.
notice.n3: Legendary Gear enhanced beyond Level 10 in Mastery cannot be used as material for other gear.
notice.n4: Top-tier gear cannot be used as Mastery Forging material.

overview.title: Overview
overview.desc: Hero Shards are used to increase a hero’s star grade. Star-up unlocks or enhances skills, increases combat power, and opens hero story.

types.title: Shard Types
types.general: Universal Shards: Can be used for most heroes of the same rarity.
types.specific: Specific Shards: Can only be used for their designated hero.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.desc: Amadeus and Helga require exclusive VIP package shards for star-up. Universal Legendary Shards cannot be used. All other heroes can use universal shards.

sources.title: Sources
sources.s4: Hall of Heroes, Alliance Shop, VIP Shop

counts.title: Required Quantity
counts.desc: A total of 1,065 shards are required to reach max star level. Including the unlock shard, 1,075 in total.

governorCharm.title: Governor Charms
governorCharm.desc: Governor Charms unlock at Town Center Level 25, allowing you to further enhance Governor Gear and significantly increase combat power. They can be upgraded up to Level 11.
governorCharm.intro: Governor Charms unlock at Town Center Level 25, allowing you to further enhance Governor Gear and significantly increase combat power. They can be upgraded up to Level 11.

governorGear.title: Governor Gear
governorGear.desc: Governor Gear unlocks at Town Center Level 22 and serves as a key system to craft and enhance powerful equipment, greatly boosting combat power.

intro.1: Governor Gear allows you to craft and strengthen powerful equipment.
intro.2: Accessible from the top-left profile menu.
intro.3: Unlocked at Town Center Level 22, it is a core way to significantly increase combat power.

upgrade.desc: Enhancement requires Silk and Gold Thread, and from Rare (Blue) grade onward, Design Sketches are also needed.

table.caption: Materials required (Silk, Gold Thread, Design Sketches) and Gear Score by equipment grade

unlock.title: Unlock
unlock.p1: Hero Gear unlocks at Town Center Level 15.
unlock.p2: Enhancement method: fuse other gear to add EXP, or use enhancement EXP components.
unlock.p3: Legendary Gear cannot be used as fusion material for other gear.

maxLevel.title: Max Level by Grade
maxLevel.desc: Common 20 / Uncommon 40 / Rare 60 / Epic 80 / Legendary 100 / Mythic 200

reforge.title: Reforge (Legendary → Mythic)
reforge.p1: When Legendary Gear reaches Level 100, it can be reforged into Mythic Gear.
reforge.p2: Reforge unlock conditions: Town Center Level 30, Server Age ~40 days
reforge.p3: Reforge requirements: Mastery Forging Level 10, plus fusing 2 additional Legendary Gears

mythic.title: Mythic Gear Enhancement
mythic.desc: Mythic Gear can be enhanced up to Level 200, requiring additional materials (Mithril/Legendary Gear) at certain milestones.
mythic.caption: Mythic 101–200 (extra material milestones + cumulative EXP tracking)
